Kanva Dam.knownFor: “ Good to visit once for Time Pass! ” Reviewed September 25, 2012 Last time i visited this place was 12 years ago. Then, the dam was always full. Now it looks more like a Lake. But nice Breeze though.. You can visit once. A good place to sit for long time and chat with your friends. There is nothing around to eat or drink. Make sure you dont throw any garbage as...
